Package com.mercadolibre.w4g9projetofinal.config

Class DataSourceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mercadolibre.w4g9projetofinal.config.DataSourceConfig
  • @Configuration
@Profile("prod")
public class DataSourceConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Data source production configuration. Uses FuryUtils to get the username and password. Configuration for other profiles are in application-${profile}.properties Production config is located here because we must use FuryUtils to get the endpoint and password of the db.
